prioritizrutils
  • Reference
  • Articles
  • News

Utilities for the prioritizr R package

The prioritizr R package provides unparalleled flexibility for creating conservation planning problems. This package contains the source code that prioritizr uses for creating and solving problems.

Links

  • Browse source code at
    https://​github.com/​prioritizr/​prioritizrutils
  • Report a bug at
    https://​github.com/​prioritizr/​prioritizrutils/​issues
